txt.en: 'These will do well! Thank you for taking the time to help, traveller.'

'War is coming to Westfold -- that much is plain. I fear we haven't made enough arrows to supply the walls, and the merchants haven't been through with the large order I made weeks ago.\n\n'We have to make our own, I'm afraid, but we haven't enough hands for the job.'
The keeper of arms at Grimslade is concerned about the supply of arrows kept for defending the walls during wartime.
Arrow-shafts in need of sharpening can be found in the armoury in Grimslade.\n\nYou should sharpen arrows to help defend the walls.
Frithferth can be found outside the Weapons Store-house in Grimslade.\n\nYou should bring the arrows to Frithferth.
